meanings.definition: The act of attending church services.
meanings.sent1: Every Sunday, the family goes to churching together.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the peaceful atmosphere of churching on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The churching service was so uplifting that it made me smile all day.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to churching is like a beacon of light in our community.

meanings.definition: The ceremony of a woman returning to church after childbirth.
meanings.sent1: After giving birth, the new mother looked forward to her churching.

meanings.definition: To bring to church for a blessing or purification.
meanings.sent1: She decided to churching her newborn for a special blessing.
